name: Charlies' Reunion
description:
This is the second game I make, it was supposed to be a 7 levels game, but I only managed to make 2 on time. All the art(this was my first time with pixel art please be comprehensive), level design and coding is made by me. The death SFX is made by FabCho and the music is from OpenGameArt.org. Hope you like it and a have a nice time playing it.

*IMPORTANT* Please play in full screen for optimal functioning

Edit: Edited submission because of a malfunction with the music and UI Scaler.

Re-Edit: Re-edited because of a bug with the movement of the fourth cyanobacteria.
